p:
In this third stage (intoxication phase), the hemorrhagic and hepatic dysfunctions of this disease occur, and other multiple organ dysfunctions may also come along. The intoxication stage is severe and accompanied by symptoms characteristic of YF disease, including jaundice (which gave it the name of “yellow fever”), vomiting (black vomit or dark vomit, other ancient names of the disease) and other hemorrhagic manifestations such as vascular leakage
8 , 27 , 36 .
